event.title: a year from when they signed up

data.event: Previously residents could rent a 240 litre bin for a year from when they signed up and pay no extra for collection, or buy 110 litre green sacks for £1 each, plus postage.
A council spokesman said: “The £30 annual charge, set in 2005, falls far short of covering running costs.

“We have made extra effort to contact residents whose hire contracts were due for renewal during February and March, so they could update their contracts before the new charges come into effect on April 1.
